title: EP matrix
summary: In mathematics, an EP matrix (or range-Hermitian matrix[1] or RPN matrix[2]) is a square matrix A whose range is equal to the range of its conjugate transpose A*. Another equivalent characterization of EP matrices is that the range of A is orthogonal to the nullspace of A. Thus, EP matrices are also known as RPN (Range Perpendicular to Nullspace) matrices.
